WorkItem.Description:
It seems that only Arcane is recognized regardless which other talents chosen. Doesn't matter if it is loaded from Battle.net or from previously saved xml files, even creating a new character file gives the same result as Arcane only.
Attached is fire xml file.

Comments.Message:
The xml file you attached has Arcane specialization selected. Click on Expand to Edit Basic Information on Stats tab and change Class/Model to Mage/Fire.

I'll look into why the specialization is not correctly selected when loading from battle.net.
Oh I see, the json is returning the name of specialization in Chinese. I'll see what's the best way to work around this.
This is now fixed and live. You might need to choose force refresh for the first time if you haven't changed any gear in game.
